alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike; Walthall; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 9:44PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN WEST FELICIANA, NORTHERN ST. HELENA AND EAST FELICIANA PARISHES, NORTHWESTERN WALTHALL, NORTHERN PIKE, SOUTHEASTERN WILKINSON AND AMITE COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 PM CST... At 944 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Little Springs to near Jackson. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mccomb, Jackson, St. Francisville, Clinton, Liberty, Magnolia, Summit, Centreville, Gloster, Wilson, Norwood, Wakefield, Smithdale, Spillman, Darlington, Felps, Gillsburg, Easleyville, and Mccomb Airport. This includes Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 6 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CST for southeastern Louisiana...and southern Mississippi.
